title: S14 Ep107: Haunting of The Boyd House
itunes:title: Haunting of The Boyd House
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS investigates the Haunting of The Boyd House with guest Jill Shelley!

There is a Haunted House in Boyd MN, no one knows exactly why it is haunted but it appears to be quite active with strange occurrences happening on a regular basis. From touching to voice, shadows to things moving on their own, today we will explore the history and claims of haunted activity.

Visit the site here: http://www.stcroixparanormal.com/boyd-house-l-l-c-.html
